title: BRIEF-Newell Brands Reaffirms Full-Year 2018 Outlook
text: 41 AM / in a few seconds BRIEF-Newell Brands Reaffirms Full-Year 2018 Outlook Reuters Staff Feb 22 (Reuters) - Newell Brands Inc: * NEWELL BRANDS PROVIDES UPDATE ON ACCELERATED TRANSFORMATION PLAN AT CAGNY CONFERENCE * REAFFIRMS FULL-YEAR 2018 OUTLOOK * NEWELL BRANDS - FOLLOWING POTENTIAL DIVESTITURES, EXPECTS TO HAVE 9 CORE CONSUMER DIVISIONS WITH ABOUT $11 BILLION IN NET SALES AND $2 BILLION OF EBITDA * DIVESTITURE PLAN IS EXPECTED TO GENERATE APPROXIMATELY $6 BILLION IN NET PROCEEDS AFTER TAXES * FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $2.70, REVENUE VIEW $14.56 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
